title: Raw beef

properties.name: description
properties.value: Raw beef is an uncooked food. Raw beef is one of the requirements of the Druidic Ritual quest. Players require only level 1 Cooking to cook raw beef. It gives 30 Cooking experience when cooked. When cooked, the raw beef may become cooked meat or burnt meat. When cooked successfully, it heals 3 hitpoints. Players can buy it from Rufus' Meat Emporium in Canifis and from Wydin's Food Store in Port Sarim. Raw beef is always dropped from cows. Members can convert raw beef into sinew by using it on a range and choosing the "Make sinew" option.

Item ID2132

Raw beef is an uncooked food. Raw beef is one of the requirements of the Druidic Ritual quest. Players require only level 1 Cooking to cook raw beef. It gives 30 Cooking experience when cooked. When cooked, the raw beef may become cooked meat or burnt meat. When cooked successfully, it heals 3 hitpoints. Players can buy it from Rufus' Meat Emporium in Canifis and from Wydin's Food Store in Port Sarim. Raw beef is always dropped from cows. Members can convert raw beef into sinew by using it on a range and choosing the "Make sinew" option.

[[File:Raw beef detail.png|left|130px]]
'''Raw beef''' is an uncooked [[food]]. Raw beef is one of the requirements of the [[Druidic Ritual]] quest. Players require only level 1 [[Cooking]] to cook raw beef. It gives 30 Cooking experience when cooked. When cooked, the raw beef may become [[cooked meat]] or [[burnt meat]]. When cooked successfully, it heals 3 [[hitpoints]]. Players can buy it from [[Rufus' Meat Emporium]] in [[Canifis]] and from [[Wydin's Food Store]] in [[Port Sarim]]. Raw beef is always dropped from [[cow]]s. Members can convert raw beef into [[sinew]] by using it on a [[range]] and choosing the "Make sinew" option.
